edu.unh.sdb.datasource
Class TransferFunction

java.lang.Object
  edu.unh.sdb.datasource.TransferFunction

public abstract class TransferFunction
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
dlipsa Converts a datum read from a RGB data source into rgba array of 4 bytes ready to be stored into a texture. Converts a datum read from a CT data source (which contains ints in the range 0-4096) into a rgba array of 4 bytes. First it scales the CT value to a value in the range 0-255 and then duplicates that value for all components.
